content.p: 20th Century Fox Internship Programme Description: Fox's internship programme is committed to offering students practical experience that complements, reinforces and placed in realistic perspective, the objectives of classroom instruction. As a Fox intern you can expect to gain real world experience as you are immersed into the inner workings of one of the largest media and entertainment companies into the inner workings of one of the largest media and entertainment companies in the world. Here you will have the opportunity to develop your skills through project based assignments. In addition, regular supervisor coaching and feedback sets our interns up for success! Whether you are left or right brain or somewhere in between, we are seeking your fresh approach and new perspectives to how we do business. Consider an internship at Fox at http://www.foxcareers.com/#/internships telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
